entry.clue: A disease that causes high level of glucose/sugar in your body, leading to serious health problems.
Too much sugar is bad for you, as it has a lot of this, which causes weight gain, diabetes, and does not give your body energy.
Found in foods that help your body stay healthy.
Apples, bananas and oranges are called this.
This word means a person is very overweight and will not be healthy
You should do this regularly to help your heart stay strong.
This is a type of food that should be limited if you have diabetes. When eaten it is broken down into sugar. Bread has a large amount of these.
